blog.title: Rose Granger-Weasley, my favorite lesbian
blog.description:
She/her, Slytherin, lesbian, dutch, 19 years old.

You can find my stuff under the "my writing" tag or on ao3 under the name donnarafiki

You can find my Ko-Fi link here in case you really like my stuff

tags: it will take a while to write bc i don't have my laptop right now
but i thought it would be fun!
body:
Heyyyyyyy guys

I had the Idea of making an “interview” for the quibbler’s queer edition with Draco interviewing Harry and vice versa. This would be while they’re not friends or dating yet, but they have talked a bit after the war.

I thought it would be fun if you guys could send me questions for that. They don’t have to be about sexuality, they can also be about jobs, parents, friends, hobby’s etc, just keep them sfw.

You can pm me, respond to this post or send me an ask!

title: Kicked Out (Sirius Black X Sister!Reader)
body:
Characters: Sirius Black X Sister!Reader

Universe: Harry Potter

Warnings: Homophobic parenting, dissownment

Request: Marauders x reader where the reader is the sister to Sirius Black and its after the marauders graduate, and one day, the reader (like 5th or 6th year)comes to his house crying because their parents have kicked her out because she told them she’s pansexual and how she likes this one really cute Hufflepuff girl (but she’s Slytherin so her parents have always been super proud of her) and Sirius just comforts her.

Sirius had moved out of the family home as soon as he was old enough. It was inevitable because of his deteriorating relationship with his parents deteriorating. He didn’t have a good relationship with most of his family, except for his little sister. You were the only member of the family he could stand to be around, and every year when you went to Hogwarts, he always paid regular visits just to make sure you never got too lonely from being away from home, and it also meant you got to see him, as he wasn’t particularly welcome in the Black Household anymore.

You were several years his junior. You were nearly half his age by the time he attended Hogwarts, so it meant there was a year from him graduating to you also starting your first year there. While you got sorted into Slytherin and shared similar thoughts with your parents, you still preferred your brother’s presence, and listened to what he had to say on the topic of blood purity, and let it slip that the whole thing was boring for you. It made Sirius laugh a little.

You’d gone back home just a week ago, since it was school break, and while Sirius missed your presence, he didn’t complain. You were in your last year in Hogwarts after 4 successful years, and you were nearing the end of your 5th. Sirius had discussed with you what you planned to do with yourself after graduation, and while you said you’d figure it out in your first, second, third and fourth year… this year was different. You’d actually hinted to liking to move in with him, and more than once. It didn’t really make sense to him- you tried so hard to make your parents proud, and he knew that the second you announced you were going to live with him that your parents would forbid it, or would disown you as well. It didn’t make sense until a week into the holiday, when you showed up at his door.

He didn’t say anything at first sight of you. The sight of you shocked him. How did you get here? More importantly, why did you have a large suitcase under your arm, and why were you crying? The questions he decided could wait, as he pulled you into his house, closing the door and ushering you over to the nearest seat. “I’m sorry Sirius- you were the first person I could think of to come to.” You explained to him quickly.

“It’s alright… what are you doing here? What happened?” He asked. You covered your face, almost of embarrassment as another wave of tears hit you. It took a minute to get an actual response.

“T-They kicked me out, Sirius!” You sobbed. That caught Sirius off guard, making him straighten his back. He knew that while his disownment didn’t matter much to him- he didn’t want to be in that darn family in the first place- you had a good relationship with your parents, and he knew that it must be breaking your heart.

“Whatever for?” He asked, bewildered on what could have caused this. Had you let slip your sudden change in plan to move with him? No, it was so sudden, and it was clear you were almost ashamed to offer it as an idea to him, he doubted you’d tell your mother.

“T-They found out that I-I…” You struggled for words. He knew it wasn’t about moving in with him at this point. You wouldn’t struggle with telling him something he already knew. You took a deep breath in, trying to calm yourself. “I-I like a girl, Sirius. I like a girl in Hogwarts. A-At first I thought it was purely just because of how nice she was- being a Hufflepuff and all… but then I… got to know her and… I don’t just like her as a friend…” You struggled to explain to him. You could barely make eye contact, but when you did, you saw a reassuring smile. A genuine smile. No judgement.

“Does my little sister have a crush?” He asked. You laughed a little at your flustered behaviour. “Tell me about her.” He encouraged. You did. You just sat there, telling him about this amazing girl in a yellow scarf, and some of the things that made you love her. She was nice to you even though you weren’t only a Slytherin, but also a member of the Black family. She’s actually helped you sneak off to Sirius’ house on several occasions by covering you. Hell- she’d spent an entire free day going all around Hogwarts with you just to help you find an earring you’d lost the other day. “She found it and claimed it was because she was a particularly good finder. I don’t know why, but it made me laugh when she said that. She laughed as well… she’s amazing Sirius.” You rambled, all while Sirius just grinned. This was the happiest he’d seen you… ever! Your tears had long stopped, though your eyes were still red. You paused, and that’s when you frowned. “Mother found out about my crush on a Hufflepuff girl… We’d had a picture took together, at a Quidditch match, and she was kissing my cheek… and on the back, she’d asked me to go to the Yule Ball with her, and I’d said yes…” You explained. “Mother saw it, and she yelled at me for it… I eventually had enough and told her that I did love her, and that in the past I have had similar feelings for other girls and boys in the past, but nothing compared to her. She disowned me right then, telling me to pack and get out of her house.” You explained.

“Y/N… I’m glad you came here. You listen to me, alright? Does this girl make you happy?” He asked. You nodded confidently. “Then that’s all that matters. You can stay here for as long as you damn want. You enjoy your holiday, and when you get back to that school… you better properly ask her out, you hear me? And invite her over, I want to meet this wonderful girl. I’ll have to help you as well get your dress ready for the ball as well! We’ll knock their socks off!” Sirius teased you, getting up and pacing to look excited as you became even more flustered, begging him to shut up.

Hope you like it! If you have any questions, please send them in! 

*Not my gif

TAGS:  @courtneychicken  @graysonmalfoy @bellero @captain-peanut-at-your-service @likiyoshi-lijie  @sebstanchrisevanchickforever19 @marveloussupernatural @aesthetjic @originalpottervengerlock @supernatural-pan @esoltis280 @lena-stan-xavier @lady-of-lies

You were the only member of the family he could stand to be around, and every year when you went to Hogwarts, he always paid regular visits just to make sure you never got too lonely from being away from home, and it also meant you got to see him, as he wasn’t particularly welcome in the Black Household anymore.

summary:
J'ai fait un rêve Harry Potter version Infinity War c'était trop cool XD (oupas)
Draco devait activer le gant, sous la pression...
body:
J'ai fait un rêve Harry Potter version Infinity War c'était trop cool XD (oupas)

Draco devait activer le gant, sous la pression de son père qui surveillait de très près, et après ça Lucius a disparu (le con bwarf). Un temps plus tard, Harry et Hermione étaient dansa bibliothèque, à faire des recherches pour ramener Ron (et les autres). Draco est arrivé pour leur demander où ils en étaient et s'il pouvait aider, mais Hermione lui a donné un coup de coude dans les côtes pour passer (elle voulait rejoindre la table où était Harry, mais Draco était sur son chemin) en lui disant qu'ils n'avaient pas besoin de son aide, et qu'il ferait mieux de les laisser tranquille, après tout, tout était de sa faute. Soit par la force du coup, ou pour les paroles, Draco s'est laissé tomber au sol contre le mur en disant qu'il ne voulait pas, qu'il n'avait pas eu le choix. Puis il est reparti et a rejoint Goyle, qui regardait une boule à neige ou un rappeltout. En le voyant arriver, il a relevé la tête, mais Draco à secoué la sienne de droite à gauche : non, pas de nouvelles de Crabbe, on ne sait pas quand on pourra le ramener.

blog.name: suburbiasqueen
blog.description: xènia // twenty-one // barcelona // i kinda talk about anything

summary: Pain - Draco Malfoy [A/N: This is definitely having part 2, btw I didn’t edit it, I will later. You can request whatever u want]...
body:
Pain - Draco Malfoy

[A/N: This is definitely having part 2, btw I didn’t edit it, I will later. You can request whatever u want]


Masterlist

She waved her wand around; I had to admit I was scared. Ron’s hand caressed mine sweetly, trying to say something but then a really blond almost white-haired man appeared. Lucius Malfoy. Draco’s dad, meaning he was then my ex father in law.

“It’s not really nice to enter without being invited in private properties” the woman said then, she was obviously mocking us.

“Oh, I’m sorry. It was YOUR MEN who took us here. You then might consider having them, not like we would have wanted to be here in the first place” I spat at her, Lucius shook his head in disbelief.

He wasn’t looking very well as he used to. He looked… poorer. Like, he had lost everything and as if somehow he couldn’t manage to sleep well at night. I couldn’t believe for the first time in years I was feeling sorry for that horrible man, who had put constantly up in trouble my friends and his son.

“Y/N, I would suggest you to shut up for once” it’s all that he said. Was he advising me? Or was he trying to mock me as well? The first year Draco and I started to have a thing, Lucius used to hate me but as the time flew by, he kind of started to be sweeter. I knew he had ended up liking me as his son’s girlfriend, that was why I wasn’t getting his message.

The woman looked at us. “I honestly don’t like you” she said before started screaming and laughing loudly. I swear I had seen her somewhere, I just couldn’t recall where. Her laughing became really strong to my ears, and it started to be hopelessly annoying. I looked up at Ron, we were both honestly scared. Knowingly that the Malfoy’s were Death Eaters and this woman seemed as she was crazy…

She was crazy.

She had been in Azkaban, for sure.

She had to be Bellatrix Lestrange.

Something clicked inside me. I had then a reason to be scared. She had killed his own cousin, I was pretty much sure she’d kill us without even blinking. Bellatrix was known as the most loyal server to Voldemort.

And I knew that somehow she knew what I was thinking and she took advantage of it. “So you know now who I am… Are you scared, princess?” She came across the room to face me, and her wand caressed my cheekbone. She was being gentle, but I knew I had to be scared. I couldn’t get my wand at that moment and Ron couldn’t either. His hand left mine. “Such a shame Draco dated you… And that you’re dating a Weasley now.”

There were loads of things I would like to have said to her. But I tried to keep my mouth shut. It was very short after her last sentence where she spoke up what could have been the end of me. She looked at me, took a few steps aside, and waved her wand again in the air… this time saying ‘crucio’.

I kneeled down instantly, feeling the worst pain I could ever have felt. Not even recalling have felt something so painful when I fell down of my groom at a Quidditch game or even after having fallen down a mountain when climbing it. That was definitely something else. It felt like a million sharp knives pointing at me and slowly entering in my skin and my body.

I didn’t even realize I was screaming my lungs out. The pain I was feeling was so intense, I tried to open my eyes to look for Ron and tried to say that I was fine, just for him to calm down at least but I couldn’t. And I tried to think of Draco, I tried to think of our first kiss hidden in the Astronomy Tower back in Hogwarts, out first date that was a trip to  Hogsmade that ended up being a complete disaster but really funny, the first time he had told me his real feelings towards me, when he had asked me to be his girlfriend and the first time we made love. Even I tried to think of all those times we would sneak around and get into each other’s common rooms or even dormitories .

The air was hot, and I felt like I was going to burst or even worse, that I’d be burned as a witch. And I would have rather that she had just burned me alive instead of feeling that pain. I tried to open my eyes, to fight the curse. I couldn’t. Inside of my head, back then, after all my feelings, all the pain and hurt I was being reminded of Neville’s parents. If she kept doing that, I’d end up as insane as them. What I was feeling was beyond any pain I could have ever felt, and somehow I found myself looking up and seeing Ron with tears in his eyes.

My throat was sore, probably from all the screaming I would have been on. And everything went black, and somehow the curse had stopped. Someone was running towards me, I tried to move but I couldn’t. “I’m sorry, princess. Are you alright? I know you’re not. Merlin, We only have two minutes.”

“Draco?” was all that I could say. “I can’t see a thing” I mumbled.

“I know, when the light comes out again, the time will be on as well. We need to make it out of here. Ron’s waiting for us. Come on, princess, I know you can do this. You can move” and hearing that he had cared even for saving Ron made my heart flutter in so many ways. I tried to move but it was really difficult, the struggle was being very visible. He came to me and he lift me up with his arms to make our way out but when we reached the door, the light came on again.

And I fell onto the ground after Draco. He was screaming, he had been hit with the Cruciatus Curse. And it wasn’t going to happen right in front of my eyes, I would never watch him go as crazy as he was going. I tried not to cry, as I lift my wand and pointed at Bellatrix before cursing her “Imperio”. She instantly left Draco alone, he stopped screaming and somehow he could get up. I didn’t even know where I had got my strength from, but I just did. I felt as if I had been born again. “You are going to let me leave with Ron” I said harshly at her. “And you’ll leave us alone for a while, you will not order anyone to follow us” I said, and as I was talking Lucius Malfoy had his wand pointing at me, he was about to cast a spell.

“Expelliarmus! Don’t you ever dare to touch her, dad” and Lucius’ wand flied to the other side of the big room. I hadn’t even recognized that we were at the Malfoy’s manor.

“You’re not leaving!” that’s all that Lucius said, he wasn’t talking to me. He was talking to Draco, he looked at me then.

“Yes, I am.”

I lowered my wand, and we left almost running, we had been now walking for while. We were fairly away from his manor. Ron had his hands tugged inside his pockets and he let one out to run it through his hair. “I didn’t know you’d have the balls” he admitted. Draco smiled at Ron’s words. Could that possibly be happening? Well, it was.

“You need to rest, princess” Draco said then.

Ron was walking ahead of us, Draco instead was beside me. Ron turned around to look at me, and I don’t know what he thought in that exact moment but the words he said then made my heart flutter once more. “Let’s go to the Headquarters”. Knowing how much he had hated Draco, or how much he still hated him, the fact that he was inviting him said a lot. He saw me smile, and added “that doesn’t mean I trust you, but after you saved my life…”

“She did” Draco snapped at Ron. I giggled then because I knew him well enough to know that he didn’t mean to be mean at that exact moment, he just didn’t want to talk.

“Don’t say that, you wouldn’t have been able to have left Ron behind even if you deeply have wanted to. And I’d be dead if it wasn’t for you” he looked at me, he was puzzled.

“My dad wouldn’t…” but he knew deep inside that I was right, that his father would have killed me and I didn’t want to push it because it wasn’t his fault.

I changed the subject. “Are you sure you want to be with us?”

He just nodded.

“You have a lot of explaining to do, Malfoy” Ron spoke up.

“Not now, Ron” I mumbled, “he’s just been casted the cruciatus curse, let him rest.”

Ron’s face flinched. “For like what?! Five seconds?! You’ve been casted that fucking shit half an hour, you could have died!” he was angry, and I didn’t blame him. If I had been the one to have had to watch Ron been cursed, I would have probably be as mad as him. And to be fairly honest, he was being very nice. I’d have just burst into emotions. I knew he had felt useless, watching me there and being unable to do a thing.

“I need to rest too…” I smiled and walked up at him, I grabbed then his hand and he hugged me. We started walking with our hands intertwined. “I’m fine, we’re fine.”

“I was so scared” he stated fixing his eyes on me, “what made you keep control? It looked like sometimes you could somehow ease the pain.”

I blushed. “I don’t know.”

After a lot of walking, we arrived to the Headquarters. Draco was following behind. We went upstairs, and Ron left to his room and I showed Draco were he could sleep. I knew there was a lot to be said, but we all needed to sleep first.

Once he sat down onto the bed, I spoke up. “You’ve been really quiet, are you okay? Do you need anything?”

He shook his head so I nodded and made my way to the door, but before I could open it, Draco was already in front of me not letting me pass. “Can you stay… with me?” he asked it looking down at the floor. Somehow I managed to smile.

“Yes, sure.”

“Of course if Ron doesn’t mind…”

I giggled. “Why would he?”

Draco frowned his eyebrows as I lied on the bed. “Aren’t you two… together?” I shook my head giggling again. He dropped the subject once he got the answer he wanted. “What made you not lose it?”

Of course he would have seen me blushing back when Ron had asked this and he had been curious. He lied down beside me, “I don’t know, I really was trying to think of you and everything we used to do when we were together” he smiled even though he knew he shouldn’t have. “There’s a lot to be said, but it can wait until tomorrow. Just sleep” I said to him, he was already closing his eyes, he just wrapped his arms around my body.

“Don’t leave” was all that he said. “Don’t leave me.”

“I won’t, I’ll be here when you wake up. I promise.”

He kissed my temple with his eyes closed, and I let myself be wrapped up in his arms. I loved that feeling. I knew there was a lot to be said, but I wanted to be between his arms once more for a little while.

I couldn’t believe for the first time in years I was feeling sorry for that horrible man, who had put constantly up in trouble my friends and his son.

“Y/N, I would suggest you to shut up for once” it’s all that he said. Was he advising me? Or was he trying to mock me as well? The first year Draco and I started to have a thing, Lucius used to hate me but as the time flew by, he kind of started to be sweeter. I knew he had ended up liking me as his son’s girlfriend, that was why I wasn’t getting his message.

The woman looked at us. “I honestly don’t like you” she said before started screaming and laughing loudly. I swear I had seen her somewhere, I just couldn’t recall where. Her laughing became really strong to my ears, and it started to be hopelessly annoying. I looked up at Ron, we were both honestly scared. Knowingly that the Malfoy’s were Death Eaters and this woman seemed as she was crazy…

She was crazy.

She had been in Azkaban, for sure.

She had to be Bellatrix Lestrange.

Something clicked inside me. I had then a reason to be scared. She had killed his own cousin, I was pretty much sure she’d kill us without even blinking. Bellatrix was known as the most loyal server to Voldemort.

And I knew that somehow she knew what I was thinking and she took advantage of it. “So you know now who I am… Are you scared, princess?” She came across the room to face me, and her wand caressed my cheekbone. She was being gentle, but I knew I had to be scared. I couldn’t get my wand at that moment and Ron couldn’t either. His hand left mine. “Such a shame Draco dated you… And that you’re dating a Weasley now.”

There were loads of things I would like to have said to her. But I tried to keep my mouth shut. It was very short after her last sentence where she spoke up what could have been the end of me. She looked at me, took a few steps aside, and waved her wand again in the air… this time saying ‘crucio’.

I kneeled down instantly, feeling the worst pain I could ever have felt. Not even recalling have felt something so painful when I fell down of my groom at a Quidditch game or even after having fallen down a mountain when climbing it. That was definitely something else. It felt like a million sharp knives pointing at me and slowly entering in my skin and my body.

I didn’t even realize I was screaming my lungs out. The pain I was feeling was so intense, I tried to open my eyes to look for Ron and tried to say that I was fine, just for him to calm down at least but I couldn’t. And I tried to think of Draco, I tried to think of our first kiss hidden in the Astronomy Tower back in Hogwarts, out first date that was a trip to  Hogsmade that ended up being a complete disaster but really funny, the first time he had told me his real feelings towards me, when he had asked me to be his girlfriend and the first time we made love. Even I tried to think of all those times we would sneak around and get into each other’s common rooms or even dormitories .

The air was hot, and I felt like I was going to burst or even worse, that I’d be burned as a witch. And I would have rather that she had just burned me alive instead of feeling that pain. I tried to open my eyes, to fight the curse. I couldn’t. Inside of my head, back then, after all my feelings, all the pain and hurt I was being reminded of Neville’s parents. If she kept doing that, I’d end up as insane as them. What I was feeling was beyond any pain I could have ever felt, and somehow I found myself looking up and seeing Ron with tears in his eyes.

My throat was sore, probably from all the screaming I would have been on. And everything went black, and somehow the curse had stopped. Someone was running towards me, I tried to move but I couldn’t. “I’m sorry, princess. Are you alright? I know you’re not. Merlin, We only have two minutes.”

“Draco?” was all that I could say. “I can’t see a thing” I mumbled.

“I know, when the light comes out again, the time will be on as well. We need to make it out of here. Ron’s waiting for us. Come on, princess, I know you can do this. You can move” and hearing that he had cared even for saving Ron made my heart flutter in so many ways. I tried to move but it was really difficult, the struggle was being very visible. He came to me and he lift me up with his arms to make our way out but when we reached the door, the light came on again.

And I fell onto the ground after Draco. He was screaming, he had been hit with the Cruciatus Curse. And it wasn’t going to happen right in front of my eyes, I would never watch him go as crazy as he was going. I tried not to cry, as I lift my wand and pointed at Bellatrix before cursing her “Imperio”. She instantly left Draco alone, he stopped screaming and somehow he could get up. I didn’t even know where I had got my strength from, but I just did. I felt as if I had been born again. “You are going to let me leave with Ron” I said harshly at her. “And you’ll leave us alone for a while, you will not order anyone to follow us” I said, and as I was talking Lucius Malfoy had his wand pointing at me, he was about to cast a spell.

“Expelliarmus! Don’t you ever dare to touch her, dad” and Lucius’ wand flied to the other side of the big room. I hadn’t even recognized that we were at the Malfoy’s manor.

“You’re not leaving!” that’s all that Lucius said, he wasn’t talking to me. He was talking to Draco, he looked at me then.

“Yes, I am.”

I lowered my wand, and we left almost running, we had been now walking for while. We were fairly away from his manor. Ron had his hands tugged inside his pockets and he let one out to run it through his hair. “I didn’t know you’d have the balls” he admitted. Draco smiled at Ron’s words. Could that possibly be happening? Well, it was.

“You need to rest, princess” Draco said then.

Ron was walking ahead of us, Draco instead was beside me. Ron turned around to look at me, and I don’t know what he thought in that exact moment but the words he said then made my heart flutter once more. “Let’s go to the Headquarters”. Knowing how much he had hated Draco, or how much he still hated him, the fact that he was inviting him said a lot. If I had been the one to have had to watch Ron been cursed, I would have probably be as mad as him. And to be fairly honest, he was being very nice. I’d have just burst into emotions. “I was so scared” he stated fixing his eyes on me, “what made you keep control? It looked like sometimes you could somehow ease the pain.”

I blushed. “I don’t know.”

He shook his head so I nodded and made my way to the door, but before I could open it, Draco was already in front of me not letting me pass. “Can you stay… with me?” he asked it looking down at the floor. Somehow I managed to smile.

“Yes, sure.”

I giggled. “Why would he?”

Draco frowned his eyebrows as I lied on the bed. “Aren’t you two… together?” I shook my head giggling again. He dropped the subject once he got the answer he wanted. “What made you not lose it?”

Of course he would have seen me blushing back when Ron had asked this and he had been curious. He lied down beside me, “I don’t know, I really was trying to think of you and everything we used to do when we were together” he smiled even though he knew he shouldn’t have. “There’s a lot to be said, but it can wait until tomorrow. “Don’t leave” was all that he said. “Don’t leave me.”

“Yes, I am.”

I lowered my wand, and we left almost running, we had been now walking for while. We were fairly away from his manor. Ron had his hands tugged inside his pockets and he let one out to run it through his hair. “I didn’t know you’d have the balls” he admitted. Draco smiled at Ron’s words. Could that possibly be happening? Well, it was.

“You need to rest, princess” Draco said then.

Ron was walking ahead of us, Draco instead was beside me. Ron turned around to look at me, and I don’t know what he thought in that exact moment but the words he said then made my heart flutter once more. “Let’s go to the Headquarters”. Knowing how much he had hated Draco, or how much he still hated him, the fact that he was inviting him said a lot. He saw me smile, and added “that doesn’t mean I trust you, but after you saved my life…”

“She did” Draco snapped at Ron. I giggled then because I knew him well enough to know that he didn’t mean to be mean at that exact moment, he just didn’t want to talk.

“Don’t say that, you wouldn’t have been able to have left Ron behind even if you deeply have wanted to. And I’d be dead if it wasn’t for you” he looked at me, he was puzzled.

“My dad wouldn’t…” but he knew deep inside that I was right, that his father would have killed me and I didn’t want to push it because it wasn’t his fault.

I changed the subject. “Are you sure you want to be with us?”

He just nodded.

“You have a lot of explaining to do, Malfoy” Ron spoke up.

“Not now, Ron” I mumbled, “he’s just been casted the cruciatus curse, let him rest.”

Ron’s face flinched. “For like what?! Five seconds?! You’ve been casted that fucking shit half an hour, you could have died!” he was angry, and I didn’t blame him. If I had been the one to have had to watch Ron been cursed, I would have probably be as mad as him. And to be fairly honest, he was being very nice. I’d have just burst into emotions. I knew he had felt useless, watching me there and being unable to do a thing.

“I need to rest too…” I smiled and walked up at him, I grabbed then his hand and he hugged me. We started walking with our hands intertwined. “I’m fine, we’re fine.”

“I was so scared” he stated fixing his eyes on me, “what made you keep control? It looked like sometimes you could somehow ease the pain.”

I blushed. “I don’t know.”

After a lot of walking, we arrived to the Headquarters. Draco was following behind. We went upstairs, and Ron left to his room and I showed Draco were he could sleep. I knew there was a lot to be said, but we all needed to sleep first.

Once he sat down onto the bed, I spoke up. “You’ve been really quiet, are you okay? Do you need anything?”

He shook his head so I nodded and made my way to the door, but before I could open it, Draco was already in front of me not letting me pass. “Can you stay… with me?” he asked it looking down at the floor. Somehow I managed to smile.

“Yes, sure.”

“Of course if Ron doesn’t mind…”

I giggled. “Why would he?”

Draco frowned his eyebrows as I lied on the bed. “Aren’t you two… together?” I shook my head giggling again. He dropped the subject once he got the answer he wanted. “What made you not lose it?”

Of course he would have seen me blushing back when Ron had asked this and he had been curious. He lied down beside me, “I don’t know, I really was trying to think of you and everything we used to do when we were together” he smiled even though he knew he shouldn’t have. “There’s a lot to be said, but it can wait until tomorrow. Just sleep” I said to him, he was already closing his eyes, he just wrapped his arms around my body.

“Don’t leave” was all that he said. “Don’t leave me.”

“I won’t, I’ll be here when you wake up. I promise.”

He kissed my temple with his eyes closed, and I let myself be wrapped up in his arms. I loved that feeling. I knew there was a lot to be said, but I wanted to be between his arms once more for a little while.

Part 2
